column2: "Hello, hello! It's me, Patty, of Patty n' Tea fame!"
"And here's my little sister Tea!"
"A~nd one more special guest! The newest member to our merry band! Come on out!!"
"...H-hello. I'm Io."
"S-SIR!?"
"1. What are you doing?"
"2. ...Nice to meet you."
"S-sir! It's not what you think!!"
"Patty said she was in big trouble and begged me... I just couldn't refuse..."
"S-sir!! Don't act like we're strangers! That hurts!"
"Patty practically begged me in tears... I just couldn't say no..."
"Yeah well, we were worried that our Patty and Tea routine was, well, becoming too routine."
"And just in the knick of time, here is our newest addition, Io, to save the day!"
"So? So??? Can you imagine all the new possibilities from this combination??"
"Hehe, everyone's so amazed by my idea that they're absolutely speechless!"
"They were shocked beyond words, you idiot."
"My apologies, Io. I never thought my sister would pull something this stupid..."
"...It's fine, Tea. It's my fault for not turning her down, too..."
"Let's head back. Sorry to disturb you, <%me>."
"...Patty, you can head back by yourself. Later."
